name: tm70
effect: Teaches Flash to a compatible Pokémon.
short_effect: Teaches Flash to a compatible Pokémon.

flavor_text_entries.diamond-pearl:
The user flashes a light that cuts the
foe’s accuracy. It can also be used to
illuminate caves.
flavor_text_entries.platinum:
The user flashes a light that cuts the
foe’s accuracy. It can also be used to
illuminate caves.
flavor_text_entries.heartgold-soulsilver:
The user flashes a light that cuts the
foe’s accuracy. It can also be used to
illuminate caves.
flavor_text_entries.black-white:
The user flashes a bright light that
cuts the target’s accuracy.
It can also be used to illuminate caves.
flavor_text_entries.black-2-white-2:
The user flashes a bright light that
cuts the target’s accuracy.
It can also be used to illuminate caves.
flavor_text_entries.x-y:
The user flashes a bright light that cuts
the target’s accuracy.
flavor_text_entries.sun-moon:
This move reduces damage from physical and
special moves for five turns. This can be used only
in a hailstorm.
flavor_text_entries.ultra-sun-ultra-moon:
This move reduces damage from physical and
special moves for five turns. This can be used only
in a hailstorm.
flavor_text_entries.lets-go-pikachu-lets-go-eevee:
This move reduces damage from physical and
special moves for five turns. This can be used only
in a hailstorm.
flavor_text_entries.sword-shield:
The user creates a bizarre area in which slower
Pokémon get to move first for five turns.
